projects.name: Student Management System
projects.description: A Java full-stack application to manage student records with CRUD operations, built using Spring Boot and MySQL.

projects.name: Online Voting System
projects.description: A secure voting system enabling user registration, authentication, and vote casting, developed with Spring Boot and MySQL.

projects.name: Course Registration System
projects.description: A Java full-stack solution allowing students to register for courses and view schedules, built using Spring Boot and MySQL.

projects.name: Online Banking Website
projects.description: A MERN stack application offering online banking functionalities like account creation, balance check, and fund transfer.

projects.name: College Portal Submission
projects.description: A MERN stack portal for students to submit assignments, view grades, and communicate with faculty.

projects.name: E-Commerce Website
projects.description: A responsive e-commerce frontend built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring product listings and a shopping cart.

projects.name: Fruit Shop
projects.description: A colorful and responsive frontend for a fruit shop, displaying products and pricing dynamically.
